subject: Education
title: Khan Academy: The Flipped Classroom Pioneer
description: A quick win: understand Khan Academy: The Flipped Classroom Pioneer.

hook.text: Sal Khan tutored his cousin on YouTube. Ten years later, 120 million people use his platform.

buildup.text: Khan Academy popularized the 'flipped classroom': watch lectures at home, do practice in class.

discovery.text: The model frees class time for active problem-solving with teacher support instead of passive listening.

twist.text: Flipped classrooms only work when students actually watch the videosâ€”many don't.

climax.text: The model works best when combined with mastery-based progression and in-class support.

punchline.text: The revolution wasn't the video. It was rethinking the classroom.

quiz.question: What is the core idea of a flipped classroom?
options: Students learn content at home via video and use class time for active practice
Teachers and students switch roles every week
All learning happens entirely online with no classroom time
